title: Please help (I've been reported multiple times)
body: Some one from riot please help me, I've played a few recent games where i crash on the loading screen and it takes a long time to load the screen. People on my team and the enemy team have reported me for being afk, also reporting me for being toxic since i was trying to tell them that i disconnected in the loading screen. It wont be a big surprise if i get banned since most of the league community is toxic and they don't care about others. So please reset the strikes i got or whatever because i honestly don't deserve them and i don't have the right to be banned off League. I hope that a Staff member reads this or if you know one please let them know! Thanks for reading. :)

replies.body:
>i don't have the right to be banned off League

Have you read the EULA?

Anyway, you shouldn't get banned for something like this. You don't get a leave marker if your game crashes and you rejoin within ten minutes. If people are reporting you, then it wouldn't be for much, considering you haven't really done anything bad, unless you're disconnecting again after reconnecting.

By any chance does this have to do with Yasuo?
